course_title: Research Topics in Political Science: Imagining Democracy Lab
class_notes:
(Same as AAS 385 3)
This class is the first part of a two-course sequence associated with the Imagining Democracy Lab, a grant-funded initiative to link imagination, knowledge, and action to advance civic and political engagement.
An application is required to be filled out and approved before enrollment in AAS 385/POLS 394 for Fall 2024 is granted.  The application is available on our African American Studies department website at aas.emory.edu.
No first year students.
course_description: Research on selected topics and problems in political science. Class will fulfill the "research" requirement for the political science major. May be repeated for credit when the topic varies.
prerequisites: POLS 208 or POLS_OX 208 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 4518, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 1-3:45p, Instructor: Anderson/Fraga, Status: Open
